snippet.title: 280 Zzzap/Dodgem for the Bally Astrocade
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

280 Zzzap is a first-person driving game very similar to Night Driver. The game displays the hood of your car at the bottom of the screen. The winding road is marked by two lines of white side-posts extending into the distance. A speedometer bar shows your current speed. There are also onscreen indicators showing how many miles you have traveled and how much time you have remaining. There are no obstacles on the road, just miles of devious curves to test your reflexes.

Dodgem presents an overhead view of a straight roadway with your car near the bottom heading toward the top of the screen. The challenge in this game is that there are other cars moving back and forth on the road, which you must avoid as you pass.


What I think:

Well, I can say nothing about "Dodgem", because it didn't work. 

Therefroe I will just say what I have to say about 280 Zzzap:

I don't like it...the handling is quite bad (especially if you drive REALLY fast...) and your car is too fat.

Stick with Night Driver, ;)
